episodes.title: QUICK TAKE : on magic and work / ep 118
episodes.summary: just elise this week chatting about work and magic. What looks like magic is usually just work. But lots of work can (slowly) add up to what feels a bit like magic. shownotes for this episode can be found at elisejoy.com/podcast/shownotes118

episodes.summary: just elise this week chatting about FEAR and how its a normal part of business decisions. If you're not scared, maybe you're not growing...but how can we manage the fear so we're not paralyzed?
